data.eml:eml: Description of a new genus for Euptychia hilara (C. Felder & R. Felder, 1867) (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae: Satyrinae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Nakahara, Shinichi, Janzen, Daniel H., Hallwachs, Winnie, Espeland, Marianne (2015): Description of a new genus for Euptychia hilara (C. Felder & R. Felder, 1867) (Lepidoptera: Nymphalidae: Satyrinae). Zootaxa 4012 (3): 525-541, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4012.3.7
